books.title: Data Analytics
books.description: This textbook is essential for aspiring data analysts, as it covers descriptive and predictive analytics across diverse types of data.

books.title: Web and Social Media Analysis
books.description: This book focuses on web scraping, building analytical models over web data, and applying data analysis techniques to real-time applications.

books.title: Fundamentals of Java Programming
books.description: This textbook covers Java's Object-Oriented Paradigm, module programming, exceptions, and I/O with examples.
